name: Iron Thorns
flavorText: It has some similarities to a Pokémon introduced in a dubious magazine as a Tyranitar from one billion years into the future.

previous.name: Iron Moth
previous.flavorText: This Pokémon resembles an unknown object described in a paranormal magazine as a UFO sent to observe humanity.

next.name: Frigibax
next.flavorText: Frigibax absorbs heat through its dorsal fin and converts the heat into ice energy. The higher the temperature, the more energy Frigibax stores.
